languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт взирает на Сестру битвы с маской холодной отстраненности на лице.{/n} "Твои суждения ничтожны перед волей элантах. Не трать воздух, чтобы запугать или оскорбить меня — твои слова что сорванные листья, которые ветер швыряет против скал".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ирлиэт взирает на Сестру Битвы с маской холодной отстраненности на лице.{/n} "Твои суждения ничтожны перед волей элантах. Не трать воздух, чтобы запугать или оскорбить меня — твои слова что сорванные листья, которые ветер швыряет против скал".

languages.text: {n}Yrliet gazes at her from beneath a veneer of cold aloofness.{/n} "Your judgements have no weight before the elantach's will. Do not waste your breath on attempts to intimidate or insult me, for your words are like picked leaves that the wind throws against the cliffs."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт взирает на Сестру битвы с маской холодной отстраненности на лице.{/n} "Твои суждения ничтожны перед волей элантах. Не трать воздух, чтобы запугать или оскорбить меня — твои слова что сорванные листья, которые ветер швыряет против скал".

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet gazes at her with a mask of cold aloofness on her face.{/n} "Your judgements have no weight before the elantach's will. Do not waste your breath on attempts to intimidate or insult me, for your words are like torn leaves that the wind throws against the cliffs."

{n}Yrliet gazes at her from beneath a veneer of cold aloofness.{/n} "Your judgements have no weight before the elantach's will. Do not waste your breath on attempts to intimidate or insult me, for your words are like picked leaves that the wind throws against the cliffs."

{n}Yrliet gazes at her from beneath a veneer of cold aloofness.{/n} "Your judgements have no weight before the elantach's will. Do not waste your breath on attempts to intimidate or insult me, for your words are like picked leaves that the wind throws against the cliffs."

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは冷たく捉えどころのない表情で彼女を見つめている。{/n}「あなたの判断はエランタの意志の前では何の重みもない。私を脅迫したり侮辱したりしても無駄だ。あなたの言葉は風が崖にぶつける摘み取った葉のようなものだからな」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gazes at her from beneath a veneer of cold aloofness.{/n} "Your judgements have no weight before the elantach's will. Do not waste your breath on attempts to intimidate or insult me, for your words are like picked leaves that the wind throws against the cliffs."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは冷たく捉えどころのない表情の下から彼女を見つめる。{/n}「あなたの判断はエランタの意志の前では何の重みもない。私を脅迫したり侮辱したりしても無駄だ。あなたの言葉は風が崖にぶつける摘み取った葉のようなものだからな」

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特凝视着阿洁塔，一脸淡漠。{/n}“在外界人的意志面前，你的判断毫无分量可言。不必浪费口舌恐吓我、侮辱我，因为你的话就像被风吹落的树叶掉在悬崖上一样。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gazes at her from beneath a veneer of cold aloofness.{/n} "Your judgements have no weight before the elantach's will. Do not waste your breath on attempts to intimidate or insult me, for your words are like picked leaves that the wind throws against the cliffs."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特凝视着阿洁塔，一脸冷漠。{/n}“在外界人的意志面前，你的判断毫无分量可言。不必浪费口舌恐吓我、侮辱我，因为你的话就像被风吹落的树叶掉在悬崖上一样。”

languages.text: {n}Yrliet le lanza una mirada cargada de fría indiferencia.{/n} «Tus opiniones no tienen ningún peso frente a la voluntad de{mf|l| la} elantach. No desperdicies el aliento para tratar de intimidarme ni insultarme, pues tus palabras son las hojas que el viento estampa contra la montaña».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gazes at her from beneath a veneer of cold aloofness.{/n} "Your judgements have no weight before the elantach's will. Do not waste your breath on attempts to intimidate or insult me, for your words are like picked leaves that the wind throws against the cliffs."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet le lanza una mirada cargada de fría indiferencia.{/n} «Tus opiniones no tienen ningún peso frente a la voluntad de{mf|l| la} elantach. No desperdicies el aliento para tratar de intimidarme ni insultarme, pues tus palabras son las hojas que el viento empuja contra la montaña».

languages.text: {n}Yrliet blickt sie mit der Fassade kalten Überheblichkeit an.{/n} "Euer Urteil hat kein Gewicht vor dem Willen des Elantach. Vergeudet nicht Euren Atem für Versuche, mich einzuschüchtern oder zu beleidigen. Eure Worte sind wie gepflückte Blätter, die der Wind gegen die Klippen wirft."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gazes at her from beneath a veneer of cold aloofness.{/n} "Your judgements have no weight before the elantach's will. Do not waste your breath on attempts to intimidate or insult me, for your words are like picked leaves that the wind throws against the cliffs."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet blickt sie von unter der Fassade der kalten Überheblichkeit auf ihrem Gesicht an.{/n} "Euer Urteil hat kein Gewicht vor dem Willen des Elantach. Vergeudet nicht Euren Atem für Versuche, mich einzuschüchtern oder zu beleidigen. Eure Worte sind wie gepflückte Blätter, die der Wind gegen die Klippen peitscht."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet la toise de toute sa hauteur, le regard hautain.{/n} « Votre jugement ne fait pas le poids face à la volonté de l'elantach. Inutile d'essayer de m'intimider ou de m'insulter, car vos paroles sont telles des feuilles que le vent viendrait écraser contre le flanc de la montagne. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gazes at her from beneath a veneer of cold aloofness.{/n} "Your judgements have no weight before the elantach's will. Do not waste your breath on attempts to intimidate or insult me, for your words are like picked leaves that the wind throws against the cliffs."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet la toise de toute sa hauteur, le regard hautain.{/n} « Votre jugement ne fait pas le poids face à la volonté de l'elantach. Inutile d'essayer de m'intimider ou de m'insulter, car vos paroles sont telles des feuilles que le vent viendrait écraser contre le flanc de la montagne. »

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, soğuk ve mesafeli bir havaya bürünüp Argenta'ya gözlerini dikiyor.{/n} "Beni yargılayarak elantach'ın aklını değiştiremezsin. Boşuna gözümü korkutmaya ya da bana hakaret etmeye kalkma. Söylediklerin, kayalıklara çarpan yapraklar misali nafile."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gazes at her from beneath a veneer of cold aloofness.{/n} "Your judgements have no weight before the elantach's will. Do not waste your breath on attempts to intimidate or insult me, for your words are like picked leaves that the wind throws against the cliffs."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet, soğuk ve mesafeli bir havaya bürünüp Argenta'ya gözlerini dikiyor.{/n} "Beni yargılayarak elantach'ın aklını değiştiremezsin. Boşuna gözümü korkutmaya ya da bana hakaret etmeye kalkma. Söylediklerin, kayalıklara çarpan yapraklar misali nafile."
